description.ru: Бесплатная онлайн домашняя бухгалтерия для учета доходов и расходов и ведения семейного бюджета.
description.en-US:
Free online personal finance service for income and expense tracking, money management and budget planning. InEx Finance offers easy-to-use yet powerful online money management tools designed to help improve your personal finances in a hassle-free and efficient way. InEx Finance is built with clean design, intuitive interface and broad flexibility in order to deliver smooth user experience. With InEx Finance you can get a firm grip on your personal finances using simple tools for expense tracking, budget planning, debt management, cash flow forecasting, financial goals setting and much more. Money Management
  • quickly add transactions in more than 70 world currencies
  • organize your expenses with multi-level categories and custom tags
  • easily import historical data from OFX, CSV, QIF, SWIFT, email
  • manage currency exchange transactions with daily updated or custom rates
  • project future spending and revenues with recurring transactions
  • review key financial data at a glance on account overview page
  • manage debts and set email reminders about due dates
  • schedule transactions in events calendar that can be synced with Google Calendar
Budgeting Tools
  • automatically generate all your budgets for next month
  • rollover budget balance to the next month
  • get alerts when you go over your budget limit
  • track budgets with insightful reports and graphs
Financial Planning & Analysis
  • visualize your personal finances from any angle with more than 25 reports
  • compare savings vs. spending, analyze stats, view trends, check goal progress
  • easily customize the reports by applying different filters and sort tools
  • quickly export your financial data to CSV/Excel
  • track transactions recorded from your mobile device in Google Maps
  • project future account balance with cash flow forecasting tools
User Experience
  • User interface: English and Russian
  • Mobile access via free Android app (supports sync) and mobile version
  • Additional features: tags auto-complete, color labels, built-in calculator
  • Full text Search tool
  • Full account backup and recovery
InEx Finance employes advanced security techniques and runs like a single page application to ensure that you can enjoy a fluid and continuous work flow. InEx Finance makes money management easy, worthwhile and fun. Try it now and feel the difference of painless personal finance management.
